extendedInfo.description: The BMO Harris Mobile Banking app offers a convenient, easy and secure way to bank on the go with your Android device. Please visit bmoharris.com/security for additional details.BMO Harris Mobile is available to BMO Harris Online Banking customers. If you do not have a BMO Harris Online Banking account, visit bmoharris.com to enroll. Make Deposits on the GoSimply take a picture of your check with your Android device camera to securely deposit it into your account.  Eligibility requirements and transaction limits apply as described in the Mobile Banking Terms and Conditions.Check Balances and Make TransfersStay up-to-date with your balances and account activity. Quickly transfer money between your eligible BMO Harris accounts with our simple transfer feature.Pay BillsEasily schedule payments to billers you've set up in BMO Harris Online Banking, see and edit scheduled payments and view recent payment activity. The features of BMO Harris Bill Pay are now in the palm of your hand.Find BMO Harris ATMs and LocationsQuickly find a BMO Harris Bank branch or ATM near you with our easy-to-use locator feature.The BMO Harris Banking app is free to download and use. Message and data rates from your wireless carrier and other fees as noted in the BMO Harris Online Banking Services Agreement may apply.Banking deposit and loan products and services are provided by BMO Harris Bank N.A. and are subject to bank and credit approval. BMO Harris and BMO Harris Bank are trade names used by BMO Harris Bank N.A. Member FDIC.Copyright 2013, BMO Financial Corp., All Rights Reserved.Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

reviews.title: Nice New Look
reviews.comment: Love the new look...so nice to able to have more access to all the features
reviews.author: mark goral

reviews.title: 4.3 Issue
reviews.comment: I keep in getting runtime errors,  and data connection issues.  I have a solid WiFi,  and Data connection.  The app worked prior to 4.3,  but now it\'s just a fail.
reviews.author: Alex Bonilla

reviews.title: Unable to deposit a check
reviews.comment: The app will not let me deposit a check. It keeps telling me to retake the photo because of the lack of a signature at the back (even though the check has clearly been signed). Please fix this.
reviews.author: Patty Skupien

reviews.title: UPDATE deposit check
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy Nexus on Shiny ROM 4.2.2 Apparently a couple developer options were causing problems loading app. Do not check Force GPU rendering or Do Not select Don\'t keep activities. One or both may have been the issue. Remembering user name finally!   Thanks Dev(s)!!
reviews.author: John Meyers

reviews.title: Updated
reviews.comment: The update was much needed. I hope to see the app get more updates to compete with other banks and their mobile apps
reviews.author: Brody Patterson

reviews.title: Works way better
reviews.comment: Not sure of all the complaints, I have not had any issues at all, thanks BMO..using an HTC one
reviews.author: David Hinton

reviews.title: It works most of the time!
reviews.comment: While I have had an issue  with the occasional deposit, the app has worked well for me most of the time. For those of you having an issue I suggest you uninstall it and reinstall. You may have a corrupt file that can occur when downloading.
reviews.author: Michael McDonald

reviews.title: HTC vx one android
reviews.comment: Update didn\'t work couldn\'t get to sign on screen. It was blank. Uninstalled app and reinstalled now it works fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its great
reviews.comment: It\'s the best app I\'ve ever used for online banking! Yea.,
reviews.author: quinley marie

reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Yeah after using it.for couple weeks it was almost perfect ...with.depositing.check...but i got stuck with one check that i cannot deposit on my account ...no matter how i.take a.pic ...of course it take stupid pic without flash PlEASE FIX THIS... it says all time error ..common u guys fix the bug ...app should be that good by itself that i dont.need to look for a.goood.light FIX IT!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slightly improved, but still low quality.
reviews.comment: Never has worked well. Barely functional. Really, this is the app of a large bank? Also, tablet mode?
reviews.author: David Nelson

reviews.title: App doesn\'t open
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy s3. All of a  sudden the app acts like its loading then backs out to my home screen. Needs a new update please.
reviews.author: Alicia Gonzalez

reviews.title: Works on phone not tablet
reviews.comment: Force closed on new Nexus 7. Still works on my Galaxy Nexus with 4.3 on both not sure why. Love the app on my phone wish it worked on my tablet.
reviews.author: Justin Arendt

reviews.title: Much improved
reviews.comment: All functions work just fine for me,  including check deposit.
reviews.author: Jay Radmer

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: It\'s really cool :-D
reviews.author: Celine Smith

reviews.title: Design got better, function got worse
reviews.comment: Navigation is weird. Transfers and any other function require you to use the pull out menu instead of previous version. Transfers don\'t allow you to swap the \"to\" and \"from\" accounts if you mess up which account goes in the \"to\342\200\235 and which one gores in the \"from\". The whole application seems slower than before. And for the check deposit one you take a picture of the front, it should automatically prompt you to take a picture of the back, if you \342\200\234OK\" the front. It all work, I just wouldn\'t consider it easier.
reviews.author: Mathew Collier

reviews.title: C\'mon BMO...forward AND backward??
reviews.comment: The new version of the app has a nice improved look, a little easier to read and navigate, and the camera has been fixed (\"rear\" pic never focused before, maybe there were other quirks too).  But...uh...seriously??? I can no longer use the app in landscape mode??? REEEAAALY??? That would have been really challenging programming?  So now, I do 80% of everything on my phone in landscape, I launch this app and I have to turn it to portrait to log on, can only navigate through the menus and different functions in portrait, BUT when I take pics of checks I\'m trying to deposit the app requires landscape (landscape for the front pic, return to the deposit form in portrait, then landscape again for the rear pic, return to the deposit form in portrait), finish my transactions in portrait (which I very much do NOT like for most of my phone usage), and then after logging out and closing the app I have to rotate it one last time to get back to landscape to proceed with other activities on my phone.  This app is fine overall. Seems like functionally it may have been improved some, but why the heck would you make it portrait only when the previous app auto-rotated?  DER.
reviews.author: Steve Gergetz

reviews.title: Excellent update
reviews.comment: This update is a drastic improvement over the old app. It now remembers user id and the interface is much cleaner and easier to use.  No lag so far. Nice job guys!
reviews.author: Ian Liu

reviews.title: Finally making headway!
reviews.comment: The latest updates are really showing promise. I like the UI changes and the fact you can now store your user ID. The app is improving and I definitely like the recent changes. The check deposit with the camera is really cool. The first time I tried it with previous versions I wasn\'t able to get it to work. Today I tried it with the new version and it worked perfectly! To the developers involved I say good job!
reviews.author: Bryan Mordt

reviews.title: Great Improvement!
reviews.comment: Sooooo much better than the old app. The old one had so many glitches, none so far in this one. Love the new interface and options great idea with the summary showing monthly cash flow i really love that. Keep up the good improvements!
reviews.author: Robert Larsen
